## skycli

Command line interface to Skygear

### Synopsis


Command line interface to Skygear

### Options

```
      --access_token="": Access token
      --api_key="": API Key
      --config="": Config file location. Default is $HOME/.skycli/config.toml
      --endpoint="": Endpoint address
```
